links.*: The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers

wikitext.*:
'''Silicon & Synapse''' was a company, founded in February [[1991]], that developed video games. It had worked on the cancelled [[wikipedia:Amiga|Amiga]]-version of ''[[The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotr2.html The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 5 February 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=7 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 8 (retrieved 5 February 2011)</ref> In [[1994]] the company changed its name to [[wikipedia:Blizzard Entertainment|Blizzard]].
